title: Michael Smith Talks NBA 'Beef'; Kyrie Irving, Kevin Durant, Stephen Curry, and Their Career Trajectories
description:
Bomani Jones and Michael Smith of Peacock's "Brother From Another" dissect all of the "beef" that we are seeing thus far in the NBA offseason (2:54), as well as how the career trajectories of Kyrie Irving, Kevin Durant, and Stephen Curry are all intertwined with one another (21:55). Plus, why players should be eyeing who the best organizations are for their next destination, as opposed to where their friends are at (36:35).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Michael Smith Talks NBA 'Beef'; Kyrie Irving, Kevin Durant, Stephen Curry, and Their Career Trajectories
